summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the supplemental assessment or reassessment and supplemental assessment or reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2497 for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Southwest from the north line of Star Addition to West Seattle to West Spokane Street, all in The City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage under Ordinance No. 27362, under Ordinance No. 33482, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll.
